entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
